title: Steve Barclay – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Steve Barclay, the Conservative MP for North East Cambridgeshire, on Twitter on 22 October 2022.
content: I’m backing Rishi Sunak to be leader of the Conservative Party and Prime Minister. Our country faces significant economic challenges and Rishi is best placed to address this.
